name: Ext.sparkline.Bar
doc:
Plots a bar chart of the values in the passed values array.

See the base class for a simple example.

members.name: barColor
members.short_doc: The bar color for positive values. ...

members.name: chartRangeClip
members.doc: If true then the y values supplied to plot will be clipped to fall between chartRangeMin and chartRangeMax - By default chartRangeMin/Max just ensure that the chart spans at least that range of values, but does not constrain it.
members.short_doc:
If true then the y values supplied to plot will be clipped to fall
between chartRangeMin and chartRangeMax - By defau...

members.name: chartRangeMax
members.doc: The maximum value to use for the range of Y values of the chart - Defaults to the minimum value supplied.

members.name: chartRangeMin
members.doc: The minimum value to use for the range of Y values of the chart - Defaults to the minimum value supplied.

members.name: colorMap
members.doc:
An object which uses range specifiers as keys to indicate bar color values for a range of values. A range specifier is specified in the form [number]:[number] indicating start and end range. Omitting either means an open ended range.

For example to render green bars on all values less than -1 and red on values higher than 1 you would use:

colorMap: {
    // Open ended range, with max value -1
    ":-1": "green",

    // Open ended range, with min value 1
    "1:": "red"
}
members.short_doc:
An object which uses range specifiers as keys to
indicate bar color values for a range of values. ...

members.name: disableTooltips
members.short_doc: Set to true to disable mouseover tooltips. ...

members.name: fillColor
members.doc: The hex value for fill color in graphs which fill areas (Line).
members.short_doc: The hex value for fill color in graphs which fill areas (Line). ...

members.name: highlightColor
members.doc: The hex value for the highlight color to use when mouseing over a graph segment.
members.short_doc: The hex value for the highlight color to use when mouseing over a graph segment. ...

members.name: highlightLighten
members.doc: How much to lighten the highlight color by when mouseing over a graph segment.
members.short_doc: How much to lighten the highlight color by when mouseing over a graph segment. ...

members.name: lineColor
members.doc: The hex value for line colors in graphs which display lines (Box, Discrete and {@link Ext.sparkline.Line Line).
members.short_doc: The hex value for line colors in graphs which display lines (Box, Discrete and {@link Ext.sparkline.Line Line). ...

members.name: negBarColor
members.short_doc: The bar color for negative values. ...

members.name: nullColor
members.doc: The bar color for null values. Usually null values are omitted and not plotted. Setting this config causes a very thin bar to be plotted with the special color in the case that null is a meaningful value in the series.
members.short_doc: The bar color for null values. ...

members.name: stackedBarColor
members.doc: An array of colours to use for stacked bar charts. The first series will use the first value in the array, the second series will use the second, etc.
members.short_doc: An array of colours to use for stacked bar charts. ...

members.name: tipTpl
members.doc:
An XTemplate used to display the value or values in a tooltip when hovering over a Sparkline.

The implemented subclases all define their own tipTpl, but it can be overridden.
members.short_doc: An XTemplate used to display the value or values in a tooltip when hovering over a Sparkline. ...

members.name: tooltipPrefix
members.doc: A string to prepend to each field displayed in a tooltip.
members.short_doc: A string to prepend to each field displayed in a tooltip. ...

members.name: tooltipSkipNull
members.doc: Null values will not have a tooltip displayed.
members.short_doc: Null values will not have a tooltip displayed. ...

members.name: tooltipSuffix
members.doc: A string to append to each field displayed in a tooltip.
members.short_doc: A string to append to each field displayed in a tooltip. ...

members.name: values
members.doc: An array of numbers which define the chart.

members.name: zeroAxis
members.doc: Centers the Y axis at zero by default.
members.short_doc: Centers the Y axis at zero by default. ...

members.name: element
members.default: {tag: 'canvas', reference: 'element', style: {display: 'inline-block', verticalAlign: 'top'}, listeners: {mouseenter: 'onMouseEnter', mouseleave: 'onMouseLeave', mousemove: 'onMouseMove'}, width: 0, height: 0}

members.name: redrawQueue
members.doc: When any config is changed, the canvas needs to be redrawn. This is done at the next animation frame when this queue is traversed.
members.short_doc: When any config is changed, the canvas needs to be redrawn. ...

members.name: all
members.doc: determine if all values of an array match a value returns true if the array is empty
members.short_doc:
determine if all values of an array match a value
returns true if the array is empty ...

members.name: applyConfigChange
members.doc: generic config value applier. Adds this to the queue to do a redraw on the next animation frame

members.name: applyTipTpl
members.doc: Appliers convert an incoming config value. Ensure the tipTpl is an XTemplate
members.short_doc: Appliers convert an incoming config value. ...

members.name: getRegion
members.doc: Return a region id for a given x/y co-ordinate
members.short_doc: Return a region id for a given x/y co-ordinate ...

members.name: getRegionTooltip
members.doc: Fetch the HTML to display as a tooltip
members.short_doc: Fetch the HTML to display as a tooltip ...

members.short_doc: Render the chart to the canvas ...
